song.title: HapPy SoUl
song.info:
Slash/AtD "HapPy SoUl" 1st place in chip tune compo
special for Synthesis party 04 18.01.2004 chip tone in my - slash's fantasy style :)
this is an intro song (coz not long)
Best regards from past))) Slash_AtD http://slash.untergrund.net/
